Name: The Purge: Anarchy
Title: The Purge: Anarchy
Desc: Five strangers must band together to survive a night of government-sanctioned carnage.
LongDescription: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.
